name: RealNews
0:
”Alexa, launch real news”
”Give me business news”
”Give me news about Bitcoin”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: real news
des: Now you can get headlines across multiple or even specific sources such as CNN or The Washington Post! You can also get news about specific topics or by category. If you link your Amazon account, you can receive an email digest with links to the articles that you specify while using the app. Powered by NewsAPI.
